description: Unique identifier of the work order associated with this cost allocation.
Identifier of the asset (vehicle or equipment) receiving this allocation for the work order.
Sequence number of the allocation line within the work order; used to order multiple lines.
Percentage of the work order’s cost assigned to this line or asset.
Monetary amount of cost allocated on this line, typically in the work order’s currency.
User ID or system process that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User ID or process that last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update.
Likely internal key for the asset or allocation used for joins; confirm with SME.
